title: Caterpillar Rental Dashboard using Flask
features: Architected a Flask microservice for Caterpillar rental analytics, integrating GeoJSON mapping and real-time data pipelines to deliver interactive dashboards with <5s response times.
Engineered a robust PostgreSQL schema and ORM layer, optimizing query performance by 35% through index tuning and connection pooling.
Implemented automated email alert system using Celery, sending actionable insights to stakeholders and reducing manual reporting effort by 70%.
